2966303031317239.Text: I believe the councilor is upstairs in her room. She will receive you there.

189714244278993115.Text: She lives in Ules Manor, near Suran. Just take the road north out of Suran, cross the bridge heading west, and look for a manor south of the road.

16840272952122724027.Text: She lives in Ules Manor, near Suran. Just take the road north out of Suran, cross the bridge heading west, and look for a manor south of the road.

1847613385101830608.Text: Nevena Ules lives at Ules Manor across the lake to the west. There's an east-west rope-and-plank bridge north of town that crosses the water just before you enter the highlands. Cross the bridge heading west, and Ules Manor is the first building on the left, south of the road.
